oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Looking South from De Long's, Point Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of people walking along De Long's Point in Missionary Ridge. There are two cannons and a tower visible atop the hillside. Features a white bottom border and an undivided back. Postcard printed in Germany. [No. 2176] Note: this postcard contains the same image as 49251.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: People; Towers; Cannons; Land; Trees
